snippet: Seen less frequently accompanying the leader in his public activities, it remained unclear whether Vice Marshal Choe Ryong-hae was removed from other key positions.
abstract: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un removes Vice Marshal Choe Ryong-hae, who was widely considered to be second-most influential person in Kim's government, from top military and party posts; is latest in list of top officials who have been purged or demoted as Kim consolidates his power.
lead_paragraph: Seen less frequently accompanying the leader in his public activities, it remained unclear whether Vice Marshal Choe Ryong-hae was removed from other key positions.

headline.main: In Latest Government Shuffle, North Korean Leader Removes No. 2 Official From Top Posts
headline.print_headline: In Latest Government Shuffle, North Korean Leader Removes No. 2 Official From Top Posts
